scripts.fix: eslint --fix build-website.config.js 'scripts/**/*.ts' 'js/**/*.js' && stylelint --fix 'css/**/*.css' && npm run fix-data
scripts.fix-data: node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/prettify-data.ts globals/plugins.json && node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/prettify-data.ts globals/widgets.json
scripts.scrape-plugins: node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/scrape/scrape.ts plugin globals/plugins.json scripts/scrape/invalid-ids.json
scripts.scrape-widgets: node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/scrape/scrape.ts widget globals/widgets.json scripts/scrape/invalid-ids.json
